title: NIT Warangal Recruitment 2025 - Apply for Junior Research Fellow Post
description: The National Institute of Technology Warangal (NIT Warangal) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech., M.E/ M.Tech. in Civil Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the NIT Warangal Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible ca...
